title: Compass of Zephrah
contents: text | This compass guilds to you the location of Zephrah (Air Ashari).

title: Orc Wrestling Champion's Belt
contents: property | Attunement | Yes. Orcs, half-orcs only
text | This belt has 3 charges. While wearing this belt, you can spend 1 charge to gain advantage on Grappling and Shoving check.
text | The belt regains 1d4 charges after a short or long rest.
